resume.name: JACK HONEYCUTT

responsibilities: Perform quarterly loss reserve analysis for P&C lines of business using Chain Ladder and Bornhuetter-Ferguson methods.
Collaborate with the pricing team to develop rate filing support documents and respond to state insurance department inquiries.
Maintain and update SQL scripts to extract policy and claims data for large-scale predictive modeling projects.
Passed Society of Actuaries (SOA) Exams P, FM, and IFM.
Assisted in the automation of data validation processes using Python, reducing manual review time by 15%.
Conducted sensitivity analysis on life insurance products to evaluate the impact of fluctuating interest rates on profitability.
Updated internal valuation models in Excel/VBA to reflect updated mortality table assumptions.
Shadowed senior actuaries during financial reporting meetings to understand GAAP and Statutory accounting principles.

skills: Proficient in R, SQL, and Python
